content:
Professors from SAP University Alliances member institutions from across the Americas are invited to attend the SAP University Alliances Summer Workshops.

Workshops are taught in a train-the-trainer format that are designed to introduce participants to SAP solution and methodology based curriculum as well as best practices for successful classroom use. Workshop content is developed and delivered by professors who are active in the program or leading SAP experts. New this year â€“ where it makes sense, instructors will introduce more than one set of course materials in a workshop, giving participants the opportunity to experience more of the great University Alliances content available for classroom use.
title: SAP UA North America Faculty Summer Workshops 2016
All SAP servers are up and running.

content:
Spring - Jan 4th 2016 to June 30th
Summer - May 1st to September 30th
Fall - August 1st to December 24th
Winter - November 1st to March 31st

Client requests open 1 month before the term begins.
